title: “Cake, Liches & Bitches” – with Aabria Iyengar
itunes:title: “Cake, Liches & Bitches” – with Aabria Iyengar
description:
This episode Aabria Iyengar joins the Halflings for pure joy, puns and much chaos, as we talk why theatre of the mind is even better than maps, playing against type and the creation of Mrytle the Bitch.

Find Aabria @quiddie on Twitter & Instagram


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.comt/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
